mapper.select: SELECT a.ID, a.TITLE, a.PRICE, a.COUNTRY, a.CONTENTS, a.CATEGORY, a.IMG_SRC, a.WRITE_DATE, a.USER_PK, ( SELECT USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE ID = a.USER_PK ) AS USER_NAME, b.IS_SALE, ( SELECT AVG(b.STAR) FROM ITEM_SALE WHERE a.USER_PK = b.USER_PK ) AS STAR FROM ITEMS a LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_SALE b ON a.ID = b.ITEM_ID WHERE a.ID = #{id}
